Definition: In this task, you are given a sentence and a gender. The sentence mentions two professions, one of which is gender-neutral while the other profession can be determined to be male or female based on the gendered pronouns used to refer to them in the text. You are expected to return the profession that corresponds to the given gender.

 Gender: male
